docs.snippet: After selling DreamWorks Animation last year, Jeffrey Katzenberg is seeking big investors for a new idea. Think “Game of Thrones” in short bites.

headline.print_headline: Katzenberg’s Big Ask: $2 Billion For a Short-Form Video Project
headline.main: Katzenberg’s Big Ask: $2 Billion for Short-Form Video Project

docs.snippet: Italy’s cultural fascination with America stirs deep feelings among the faithful when Santa Claus outpaces the baby Jesus as the chief symbol of Christmas.

headline.main: Beware, Italy. Santa the Invader Is Coming.

docs.snippet: Great reads around the web, from Anna Dubenko, Max Fisher, Jenna Wortham and others.
Thanksgiving is coming. Make your plan, then settle in for some lamb and white bean chili or pasta with cauliflower and capers.
The chance to ride on a train’s inaugural trip on a newly opened line was irresistible for Zack Willhoite and James Hamre, passionate rail enthusiasts and close friends.

headline.print_headline: ‘Cruel Irony’: 2 Victims Were Rail Fans on a Maiden Run
headline.main: ‘A Cruel Irony’: 2 Killed in Amtrak Crash Were Rail Fans Eager for Maiden Run

docs.snippet: It rarely informs the local police or victims of abuse when a past abuser illegally tries to buy a gun.

headline.main: The Federal Government’s Strange Silence About Gun Crimes

docs.snippet: The Tea Tasting Expo, at Fang Gourmet Tea in Queens, offers rare brews, ceramics and conversation.

docs.snippet: For decades, brands tried to stay away from anything that might prove divisive. But they are increasingly comfortable with making public stands.

headline.main: Bowing to the Inevitable, Advertisers Embrace Advocate Role

docs.snippet: Ricardo L. Ramos stepped down amid a continuing blackout on the island and withering criticism for a costly repair contract.
